message: This is what i have come up so far. I hope this is what he is looking for lol ;)

@OmarRamos @MuraliRaju  I added DatabaseHelper class and put in methods to recover, create, update, and remove a customer.  Let me know what you think.  I'll need to add methods to manipulate the purchases as well.

Tony want to divide up the tasks so we don't conflict with code changes.\nI am planning on working tonight and all day tommorow to finish the program.\nLooks like I will be MIA next week.  So I want to finish this this weekend.
Ok. i thought you'd work on android specific changes, and I would work on java and db interactions
I pushed a database helper class that can pull and push Customer objects to/from db so the android pages can access customer details
I'm working on the Purchases now, so we'll be able to get points, gold status, and reports

OK - I will work on Android and lets touch base again tomorrow afternoon.  I will review your Java classes also.  Just to be clear you will code all the data aspects and I will do the UI to grab your data.
And Omar will take your data and put it in the cloud.
right. there'll be static fields in DatabaseHelper for address, username, password, and such for mySQL
@OmarRamos  my SQL is rather bad.  if you get a chance would you check the sql commands in DatabaseHelper to make sure I did them right?
